Hero.desc: Direct B2B furniture sourcing from İnegöl, Turkey to Spain. Bridging European design with Turkish craftsmanship excellence.

About.title: Furniture is in Our DNA.
About.para1: "For us, furniture is not just a commodity; it is a heritage. Born and raised in İnegöl—the heart of Turkey’s furniture industry—we grew up in the workshops where sawdust turns into art."
About.para2: We combine this innate understanding of craftsmanship with Industrial Engineering precision (UPV Alumni). We know which wood lasts a lifetime, which fabric withstands hotel traffic, and which joint will never creak. We don’t just source furniture; we guarantee 'Heirloom Quality'—pieces built to last for generations.

FAQ.a1: Yes. We deliver DDP (Delivered Duty Paid). No customs paperwork for you. We handle everything from the Turkish border to your door in Spain.
